QuestData.Title: One of a Kind
QuestData.Description: At first glance, it be lookin' like da same old story here - trolls tappin' into forbidden powah by destroyin' da very beings dey should be worshippin'.$b$bIf what I learned be true, den dey have a special golem - one like nuthin' created before!$b$bBring me back a piece from dat golem ta study.
QuestData.LogDescription: Chronicler Bah'Kini wants you to recover a piece of the Drakkari Colossus in Gundrak.
